page.title: 12HEALTH
page.content: In our village we are very fortunate as the standard of health is very high. This is no doubt due to the fact that there are no poor people and we all get enough food. We also have very good medical and hospital care. The National Health Service provides us with free treatment for any illnesses and hospitalisation. The most common illnesses for adults are coughs,colds and flu. For children it is colds,ear and throat infections. Our doctor, who visited our class recently told us that most adults die from heart trouble and cancer. Few children die but those who have died recently have been involved in road accidents. We do not have problems like glue sniffing and drug addiction. Most parents have their babies innoculated and vaccinated.
